thread.section_title: e-Careers Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of e-Careers | e-careers.com | 2 of 212
thread.title: Cassandra

author: Cassandra
title: Cassandra
text: I have recently completed both of my online courses via e-careers . I initially had a few problems with signing in and file compatibility . After a quick phone call , the lady was able to help me ,identify my problem and talked me through the process of logging in and locating the course material with ease . The overall courses were informative and i feel like i've learned a lot .
